Texts.Eng: 115% Base Power with Pistols and Daggers.
120% Base Power with Bows, Sniper Rifles, and Shotguns.
Crouching for 2 seconds grants a 5 second period of Invisibility. Using Energy dispels this effect.

Press [Shift] + [G] to switch between Fire, Electric, and Nova. Press [G] to lob a Grenade towards your cursor (10 Second Cooldown). Double-tap [A] or [D] to Dodge (5 Second Cooldown). Press [Shift] + [W] when Energy is full to Energize Mida (Nova -> Deadfall, Electric -> Pulsar, Fire -> Sunshot): this effect drains Energy and then dissipates. Grenade, Dodge, and Energize effects depend on Multitool Element.
